item.description: The time has come for Ace and I to go back to war. I hope to see everyone before I leave and wish I gave more notice for this event. Come even if it's just for five minutes. Let's have a kick ass drunken time before I leave at Murphy's! An after party will most likely take place since most of us like wild and crazy parties so I will make that happen. Let's have some fun most importantly so be ready!
item.how_to_find_us: I'm the tall guy with red hair or just call me at 860-919-9782 tell them your here for John's party if asked!
item.name: Going Away Party!
